name: Papo Town: Baby Nursery
summary: Welcome to Papo Town: Baby Nursery! This is a newly upgraded kindergarten where everyone can freely create, explore, and learn with joy. You could play house and pretend to be any role you like: a teacher, a nurse or a cook and take care of our adorable babies, just like in a real kindergarten! Play and interact with cute little friends without any rules, fostering imagination and enhancing cognitive abilities in an interactive environment. Experience the joyful activities of a kindergarten and look forward to the real preschool life!
